title: James A. Milward, “The Silk Road: A Very Short Introduction” (Oxford UP, 2013)
description:
James A. Milward‘s new book offers a thoughtful and spirited history of the silk road for general readers.The Silk Road: A Very Short Introduction (Oxford University Press, 2013) is part of the Oxford “A Very Short Introduction” series. The book is organized into six chapters that each take a different...
